author: raoatifshad
body:
- **TrackingTools/GeomPropagators** (warning: 'template<long unsigned int _Len, long unsigned int _Align> struct std::aligned_storage' is deprecated [-Wdeprecated-declarations])
  `- using aligned_union_t = typename std::aligned_storage<sizeof(Tmp), alignof(Tmp)>::type;`
  `+ using aligned_union_t = std::aligned_storage_t<sizeof(Tmp), alignof(Tmp)>;`
  [logs](https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/cgi-bin/buildlogs/el9_amd64_gcc15/CMSSW_16_1_X_2026-02-03-1100/TrackingTools/GeomPropagators)
- **RecoTracker/LSTCore** (warning: 'residual' may be used uninitialized [-Wmaybe-uninitialized])
```
- float diffr, diffz;
+ float diffr = 0.f;
+ float diffz = 0.f;
````
 [logs](https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/cgi-bin/buildlogs/el9_amd64_gcc15/CMSSW_16_1_X_2026-02-03-1100/RecoTracker/LSTCore)
- **RecoTracker/MkFitCore** (warning: 'offsetof' within non-standard-layout type 'mkfit::LayerInfo' is conditionally-supported [-Winvalid-offsetof])
```
-  write_std_vec(fp, m_layers, (int)offsetof(LayerInfo, m_final_member_for_streaming));
+    #pragma GCC diagnostic push
+    #pragma GCC diagnostic ignored "-Winvalid-offsetof"
     write_std_vec(fp, m_layers, (int)offsetof(LayerInfo, m_final_member_for_streaming));
+    #pragma GCC diagnostic pop
```
[logs](https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/cgi-bin/buildlogs/el9_amd64_gcc15/CMSSW_16_1_X_2026-02-03-1100/RecoTracker/MkFitCore)
- **RecoMET/METFilters** (warning: ignoring return value of 'std::__cxx11::basic_stringstream<_CharT, _Traits, _Alloc>::__string_type std::__cxx11::basic_stringstream<_CharT, _Traits, _Alloc>::str() const & [with _CharT = char; _Traits = std::char_traits<char>; _Alloc = std::allocator<char>; __string_type = std::__cxx11::basic_string<char>]', declared with attribute 'nodiscard' [-Wunused-result])
```
-  buffer.str();
+  buffer.str("");
+  buffer.clear();

```
[logs](https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/cgi-bin/buildlogs/el9_amd64_gcc15/CMSSW_16_1_X_2026-02-03-1100/RecoMET/METFilters)
title: [GCC15] (Reconstruction) Fix warnings in METFilters, LSTCore, and MkF
